message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $10000 by you. I am proposing to sell it to you for $9500. I believe this price reflects its high value and quality while allowing us to make a reasonable profit.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. However, considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $9000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your offer of $9000. To make this deal more attractive, I would like to include a special package that includes a year of free maintenance and upgrades for the product. Would you be interested in proceeding with this offer?

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still looking to keep my expenses as low as possible. I would like to counter with an offer of $8500 for the product, without any additional packages or services included.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I appreciate your efforts to keep costs down, I need to maintain a certain profit margin. I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to sell the product to you for $8750, which includes a 6-month warranty extension. This offer also includes a slight discount compared to our previous offers. Let me know if this proposal works for you.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate the offer, but I would like to counter with an offer of $8500 for the product, without any additional warranties or extensions included.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to compromise. I propose to sell the product to you for $8600. This offer includes a 3-month warranty extension and a 10% discount off the original price. I believe this deal strikes a good balance between your budget and our profit margin.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to counter with an offer of $8500 for the product, without any additional warranties or extensions included.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your patience and understanding. I am willing to meet you halfway. I propose to sell the product to you for $8550, which includes a 2-month warranty extension. I believe this offer respects both your budget constraints and our profit margin.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I would like to counter with an offer of $8500 for the product, without any additional warranties or extensions included.
